an6.73:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharitum.
an6.73:1.4: Kamesu kho panassa adinavo na yathabhutam sammappannaya sudittho hoti.
an6.73:1.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahaya abhabbo pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharitum.
an6.73:2.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharitum.
an6.73:2.4: kamesu kho panassa adinavo na yathabhutam sammappannaya sudittho hoti.
an6.73:2.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaya bhabbo pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharitun”ti.
